# AnonForge

> NFT creation and marketplace platform on Cardano blockchain

## About

AnonForge is a platform for creating, managing, and minting NFT collections on the Cardano blockchain. It provides a visual layer-based generation system and integrates with NMKR for minting.

## Features

### For Creators
- **Layer-based NFT Generation**: Upload PNG layers organized by categories (body, eyes, accessories, etc.)
- **Visual Connection Editor**: Create layer exclusions, effects, and switches with a drag-and-drop interface
- **Rarity Configuration**: Set probability weights for each trait
- **Batch Generation**: Generate collections with configurable uniqueness requirements
- **NMKR Integration**: Direct minting through NMKR API with prepaid or on-demand minting
- **Product Pages**: Customizable collection pages with social links and founder info
- **Marketing Spotlight**: Featured placement on the marketplace

### For Collectors
- **Marketplace**: Browse verified and community collections
- **Collection Pages**: View collection details, mint prices, and creator info
- **Countdown Timers**: Track upcoming collection launches

## Main Pages

- `/` - Homepage with featured collections and marketplace preview
- `/marketplace` - Browse all live NFT collections
- `/collection/{id}` - Individual collection details and minting
- `/documentation` - User guide and platform documentation
- `/dashboard` - Creator dashboard (authenticated users)
- `/project/{id}` - Project editor for creating NFT collections

## Technology

- Built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
- Backend powered by Supabase (database, auth, storage, edge functions)
- Minting through NMKR API on Cardano blockchain
- Payments accepted in ADA cryptocurrency

## API

AnonForge uses Supabase Edge Functions for backend operations. Key endpoints:
- `/functions/v1/nmkr-proxy` - NMKR API integration
- `/functions/v1/blockfrost-webhook` - Blockchain transaction monitoring
- `/functions/v1/content-moderation` - AI-powered content safety

## Contact

- Website: https://anonforge.app
- For creator verification and support inquiries, use the in-app contact options

## Terms

By using AnonForge, users agree to the Terms of Service available at /terms-of-service.
Creators are responsible for ensuring their content complies with applicable laws and our content policy.
